query:
UPDATE platforms
            SET
                name = CASE
                    WHEN $2 ? 'name'
                    THEN ($2->>'name')::VARCHAR
                    ELSE name END,
                api_key_hash = CASE
                    WHEN $2 ? 'api_key_hash'
                    THEN ($2->>'api_key_hash')::VARCHAR
                    ELSE api_key_hash END
            WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING id, name, api_key_hash
